languages.text: "Сейчас нас заберут в Прорву. Поговорим в тихом месте — в логове Ревущих".

traits.locale_text: "Сейчас нас заберут в Прорву. Поговорим там".

languages.text: "They will take us to the Chasm now. Let us talk somewhere quiet — the Shriekers' den will do."
languages.original_text: "Сейчас нас заберут в Прорву. Поговорим в тихом месте — в логове Ревущих".

traits.locale_text: "They will take us to the Chasm now. Let us talk there."
"They will take us to the Chasm now. Let us talk there."
"They will take us to the Chasm now. Let us talk somewhere quiet — the Shriekers' den will do."
"They will take us to the Chasm now. Let us talk somewhere quiet — the Shriekers' den will do."
"They will take us to the Chasm now. Let us talk somewhere quiet — the Shriekers' den will do."
"They will take us to the Chasm now. Let us talk somewhere quiet — the Shriekers' den will do."

languages.text: « Ils vont nous emmener dans l'Abîme. Trouvons un endroit calme où discuter. Le repaire des Hurleurs devrait faire l'affaire. »
languages.original_text: "They will take us to the Chasm now. Let us talk somewhere quiet — the Shriekers' den will do."

traits.locale_text: « Ils vont nous emmener dans l'Abîme. Trouvons un endroit calme où discuter. Le repaire des Hurleurs devrait faire l'affaire. »

languages.text: “他们现在要把我们带到裂隙了。我们找个安静的地方谈谈吧，尖啸者的老巢是个不错的地方。”
languages.original_text: "They will take us to the Chasm now. Let us talk somewhere quiet — the Shriekers' den will do."

traits.locale_text: “他们现在要把我们带到裂隙了。我们找个安静的地方谈谈吧，尖啸者的老巢是个不错的地方。”

languages.text: 「我々が案内されるのは裂け目だ。静かな場所で話がしたい。シュリーカーズの巣穴でいいだろう」
languages.original_text: "They will take us to the Chasm now. Let us talk somewhere quiet — the Shriekers' den will do."

traits.locale_text: 「我々が案内されるのは裂け目だ。静かな場所で話がしたい。シュリーカーズの巣穴でいいだろう」

languages.text: "Sie bringen uns jetzt zur Kluft. Lasst uns irgendwo in Ruhe reden – im Unterschupf der Kreischer."
languages.original_text: "They will take us to the Chasm now. Let us talk somewhere quiet — the Shriekers' den will do."

traits.locale_text: "Sie bringen uns jetzt zur Kluft. Lasst uns irgendwo in Ruhe reden – im Unterschupf der Kreischer."

languages.text: «Ahora nos llevarán al Abismo. Hablemos en algún lugar tranquilo; la guarida de los Aulladores servirá».
languages.original_text: "They will take us to the Chasm now. Let us talk somewhere quiet — the Shriekers' den will do."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora nos llevarán al Abismo. Hablemos en algún lugar tranquilo; la guarida de los Aulladores servirá».

languages.text: "Bizi Yarık'a götürecekler şimdi. Sessiz sakin bir yerde konuşalım. Çığırtkanların ini işimizi görür."
languages.original_text: "They will take us to the Chasm now. Let us talk somewhere quiet — the Shriekers' den will do."

traits.locale_text: "Bizi Yarık'a götürecekler şimdi. Sessiz sakin bir yerde konuşalım. Çığırtkanların ini işimizi görür."
